feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING, North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 p.m. ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 11:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
